text: Maxim Alekseyevich Burov ( (born 5 June 1998) is a Russian male freestyle skier. He participated under the Olympic flag, representing Russia during the 2018 Winter Olympics and competed in the men's aerials. His elder brother, Ilya Burov, is a fellow freestyle aerials skier and has competed at the 2014 Winter Olympics and in the 2018 Winter Olympics. The brothers competed at the men's aerials freestyle skiing event in the 2018 Winter Olympics, with Ilya winning a bronze medal in the event while Maxim Burov finished in 15th position. ==World Cup podiums== ===Individual podiums=== * 5 wins * 8 podiums {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;" !
